entry.title: 脚本
entry.content:
#!/bin/bash
for sealed in ls /export/sealed/
do
cache=echo $sealed|sed 's/sealed/cache/'
{
rsync -au /export/sealed/$sealed /mnt/10.3.14.17/export/sealed/
rsync -au /export/cache/$cache /mnt/10.3.14.17/export/cache/
} &
while [ pgrep -c rsync -gt 5 ]
do
sleep 10
done
done

title:钱包

###########多签钱包提币，转币
#提币
#miner上执行，取到提币返回值
lotus chain encode params –encoding=hex <miner地址> 16 {"amountRequested":"500000000000000000000"}
#审批地址上执行
lotus msig propose –from=<多签审批地址> <多签钱包地址> <miner地址> 0 16 <返回值>

#转币
#miner上执行，取转币返回值
lotus chain encode params –encoding=hex <多签钱包地址> 2 “{"To":"<到账地址>" ,"Value":"<转账金额>" , "Method":2 , "Params":"null"}”
#在审批地址上执行
lotus msig propose –from <多签审批地址> <多签钱包地址> <到账地址> <转账金额> 0 <返回值>

#############更好普通owner钱包为多签钱包
lotus-miner actor control list –verbose #查看miner钱包
lotus msig create –required=2 –from [发起人] [签名人1，签名人2] //创建多签钱包
lotus msig inspect f000000<多签钱包> //检查多签钱包
lotus send –from owner钱包 多签钱包 0.1 //给多签钱包转0.1个fil。
lotus-miner actor set-owner –really-do-it //更换owner钱包给多签地址
lotus chain encode params –encoding=hex 23 "" //执行特有方法得到返回值
lotus msig propose –from= 0 23 //确认更换多签钱包
通知财务添加多签钱包地址到这个节点审批

####更换worker钱包
#创建新钱包
lotus wallet new bls
#向新钱包转点钱
lotus send –from <旧钱包> <新钱包>
##更改worker地址，命令很快结束，但是要5.5小时才能生效
lotus-miner actor propose-change-worker –really-do-it <新地址>

#####更换control钱包
#创建新钱包
lotus wallet new bls
#向新钱包转点钱
lotus send –from <旧钱包> <新钱包>
#更换两个control钱包
lotus-miner actor control set –really-do-it=true <新地址1>

entry.content:
title:算力机部署

#组raid0
mdadm –stop /dev/md*
mdadm –misc –zero-superblock /dev/nvme*n1
组raid0
mdadm -Cv /dev/md0 -a yes -n 8 -l 0 /dev/nvme0n1 /dev/nvme1n1 /dev/nvme2n1 /dev/nvme3n1 /dev/nvme4n1 /dev/nvme5n1 /dev/nvme6n1 /dev/nvme7n1
mdadm -Cv /dev/md0 -a yes -n 4 -l 0 /dev/nvme0n1 /dev/nvme1n1 /dev/nvme2n1 /dev/nvme3n1
mdadm -D –scan >/etc/mdadm.conf
mkfs.xfs -f /dev/md0
ls -l /dev/disk/by-uuid/|awk ‘/md0/{print “echo "/dev/disk/by-uuid/“$9” /opt/raid0 xfs defaults 0 0" >>/etc/fstab”}’|bash
mkdir /opt/raid0 -p
mount -a

#关闭图形界面
systemctl mask sleep.target suspend.target hibernate.target hybrid-sleep.target
systemctl set-default multi-user.targe
查看df -h 看是否挂载
cd /dev/disk/by-uuid/
将磁盘开机自启写在/etc/fstab 中
/dev/disk/by-uuid/65f9c92e-b155-405c-b5c6-431706996a84 /opt/raid0 xfs defaults 0 0
挂载 mount -a
拷贝模版
安装nfs
export http_proxy=http://10.0.10.1:1087;export https_proxy=http://10.0.10.1:1087;
apt install nfs-kernel-server nfs-common -y

title:提币转币

#审批地址上执行
#多签审批地址，多签钱包地址，浏览器找owner
#mienr地址浏览器找（节点地址） 第一个地址
#返回值（上面节点内执行的返回值）
#miner上执行，取到提币返回值
#3823000000000000000000（表示3823个fil，后面要18个0）
多签审批地址=浏览器搜节点 点击owner 选择f3开头的
多签钱包地址=也就是账户地址 跟节点号相似
#提币
###miner上执行，取返回值：
lotus chain encode params –encoding=hex <miner地址> 16 {"amountRequested":"500000000000000000000"}
#在lotus上执行：
lotus msig propose –from=<多签审批地址> <多签钱包地址> <miner地址> 0 16 <返回值>
#转币
###miner上执行，取返回值：
lotus chain encode params –encoding=hex <多签钱包地址> 2 “{"To":"<到账地址>" ,"Value":"<转账金额>" , "Method":2 , "Params":"null"}”
#在lotus上执行：
lotus msig propose –from <多签审批地址> <多签钱包地址> <到账地址> <转账金额> 0 <返回值>
#审批
lotus msig approve –from 审批地址 多签钱包 消息id
lotus msig approve –from f1u6ofa7nkeqsmt5t7otobcksyaglldxunanug5aa f01408548 9
#单签转币
lotus-miner actor control list –verbose #查看miner钱包
lotus-miner actor withdraw 数量 #提币到onwer钱包
lotus send –from onwer钱包 转账钱包 数量 #转账

title:提币转币

#审批地址上执行
#多签审批地址，多签钱包地址，浏览器找ow

entry.content:
title:报错

#证明
strace df -h
time=$(date +%Y-%m-%d )
cat /opt/raid0/lotusminer-window/lotusminer/logs | grep -a $time | grep -E “Checked|computing|Submit|checkPro|faulty sectors|migrated|deadline [0-9]|ERROR|successful|WARN|Index|advmgr” -a
lotus-miner proving deadlines | grep current
#诚信
time=$(date +%Y-%m-%d )
cat /opt/raid0/lotusminer-window/lotusminer/logs | grep -a $time | grep -v “stream reset” | grep -E “Checked|computing|Submit|checkPro|faulty sectors|migrated|deadline [0-9]|ERROR|successful|WARN|Index|advmgr” -a

time=$(date +%Y-%m-%d –date=”-1 day”)
time=$(date +%Y-%m-%d)
grep -a $time /opt/raid0/lotusminer-winning/lotusminer/log* -r | grep ‘“isEligible”: true, “isWinner”:’ -c
grep -a $time /opt/raid0/lotusminer-winning/lotusminer/log* -r | grep ‘“isEligible”: true, “isWinner”: true’ -c

#GPU报错
sudo rmmod nvidia_drm
sudo rmmod nvidia_uvm
sudo rmmod nvidia_modeset
sudo rmmod nvidia
nvidia-smi
apt-mark hold nvidia-driver-515-server (驱动版本号)
查看驱动版本号：cat /proc/driver/nvidia/version
entry.summary:
title:报错

#证明
strace df -h
time=$(date +%Y-%m

entry.content:
title:扇区延期

cd /opt/raid0/lotusminer-window/
source profile
#过期的天数
lotus-miner sectors check-expire –cutoff=106560

lotus-miner sectors check-expire –cutoff 244800(2880*(过期的天数))

#延长180天
lotus-miner sectors renew –sector-file=sectors_files.txt –extension=518400 –really-do-it

#延长
lotus-miner sectors renew –really-do-it –sector-file /home/shen/a.txtaa –new-expiration 2644519 –tolerance 0

#加gas
lotus mpool replace –gas-feecap 55306789 –gas-premium 263764 –gas-limit 4573134063（limit） 返回的cid

lotus mpool replace –gas-feecap 50000000 –gas-premium 2718117 –gas-limit 3529574370 bafy2bzacec6ma34ngr5orsynyghluquppadsegctzxhkydo6lswkjh4gvirza

#查看高度
lotus sync waits

#查看消息没上链
lotus mpool pending –local
lotus mpool pending –local | jq -c ‘.CID’ | awk -F ‘“‘ ‘{print $4}’

entry.content:
title:存储

#格式化文件系统
lsblk |grep -w 14.6T |awk ‘{print “mkfs.xfs -f /dev/“$1}’
#创建目录
mkdir -p /mnt/disk{1..36}

lsblk -l |grep ‘14.6T’ |awk ‘{printf $1”|”}’

lsblk |grep -w 14.6T |awk ‘{print $1}’
lsblk |grep -w 14.6T |awk ‘{print $1}’ | wc -l

#安装redis 和nfs
apt install redis -y
apt install nfs-kernel-server -y

#安装mergerfs
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:ubuntu-toolchain-r/test
apt -y install libgcc-s1
dpkg -i mergerfs_2.33.5-179-gaef99ad~ubuntu-bionic_amd64_1.deb
systemctl restart nfs-server.service
systemctl status nfs-server.service

echo “/export *(rw,async,no_root_squash,no_subtree_check,fsid=-1)” > /etc/exports
#开始跑
df -h | grep 15T |awk ‘{printf $NF”:”}’ |awk ‘{print “mergerfs -o noforget,allow_other,use_ino,nonempty,category.create=redis,minfreespace=65G,combinedirs=/cache/:/sealed/,redis=tcp://127.0.0.1,threads=40,security_capability=false,cache.attr=10000,cache.entry=1000,cache.negative_entry=1000,cache.readdir=true “$1 “ /export”}’|bash

#先河
df -h | grep 15T |awk ‘{printf $NF”:”}’ |awk ‘{print “mergerfs -o noforget,allow_other,use_ino,nonempty,category.create=redis,minfreespace=65G,combinedirs=/.lotusworker/cache/:/.lotusworker/sealed/,redis=tcp://127.0.0.1,threads=40,security_capability=false,cache.attr=10000,cache.entry=1000,cache.negative_entry=1000,cache.readdir=true “$1 “ /export”}’|bash

#官方
df -h | grep 15T |awk ‘{printf $NF”:”}’ |awk ‘{print “mergerfs -o noforget,allow_other,use_ino,nonempty,minfreespace=65G,category.create=rand “$1 “ /export”}’|bash

systemctl restart nfs-server.service
systemctl status nfs-server.service

#建目录
mkdir /mnt/data{1..36}
for i in lsblk |grep 14.6 |awk '{print "ls -l /dev/disk/by-uuid | grep "$1}' | bash | awk '{print $9}' | sort | uniq ; do a=$(($a+1)); echo “/dev/disk/by-uuid/$i /mnt/data$a xfs defaults 0 0”; done

#存储初始化
source /opt/raid0/lotusminer-window/profile
lotus-miner storage attach –store –init /mnt/10.0.200.4/export
source /opt/raid0/lotusminer-winning/profile
lotus-miner storage attach –store /mnt/10.0.200.4/export
source /opt/raid0/lotusminer-sealing/profile
lotus-miner storage attach –store /mnt/10.0.200.4/export

entry.content:
title:命令

#替换换行
sed “:a;N;s/ //g;$!ba”
sed ‘:a;N;$!ba;s/ / /g’
#两行合并为一行
sed ‘$!N;s/ / /‘
#查看是否有在落盘
lotus-miner sealing jobs | grep -i fin |wc -l
#停落盘
lotus-miner worker-pause –uuid all –tt fin
#开落盘：
lotus-miner worker-resume –uuid all -tt fin
#释放内存
sync && echo 3 > /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches
#让任务给别的机器做
lotus-miner sealing jobs |grep “” | awk ‘{print “lotus-miner sealing abort “ $1}’
#查看算力机
lotus-miner sealing workers|awk ‘{print $4,$5}’|grep [a-Z]|sort|uniq -c
#扇区如果是已经上链，需要先清除链上数据再remove扇区
lotus-miner sectors terminate –really-do-it 扇区编号
#删除已清除链上数据的扇区
lotus-miner sectors remove –really-do-it 扇区编号
#下载lotus快照
apt -y install dos2unix && curl -sI https://snapshots.mainnet.filops.net/minimal/latest.zst | awk ‘/Location:/ {print “wget -c “ $2}’ |dos2unix| bash
#定义分隔符
awk ‘{printf $1 “|”}’

for i in seq 848;do head -n1 176-car.txt |awk ‘{print “boost offline-deal –verified=true –provider=f01527777 –duration=1526400 –commp=”$3” –car-size=”$4” –start-epoch=2469600 –piece-size=34359738368 –storage-price=0 –payload-cid=”$2}’ |bash | egrep ‘deal uuid|storage provider|payload cid|commp|start epoch|end epoch’ |awk ‘{printf $NF “|”}’ |awk ‘{print $1}’ >> ok-176.txt && sed -i ‘1d’ 176-car.txt ;done
for i in awk -F '|' '{print $4}' /tmp/ok-176.txt | head -n 1 ; do car=grep $i /mnt/10.3.13.176/export/176-car.txt | awk '{print $1}' | sed 's/\"//g';uuid=grep $i /tmp/ok-176.txt | awk -F '|' '{print $1}';boostd import-data $uuid /mnt/10.3.13.176/export/data04/$car.car && sed -i “/$i/d” /tmp/ok-176.txt ; done

#!/bin/bash
for sealed in ls /export/sealed/
do
cache=echo $sealed|sed 's/sealed/cache/'
{
rsync -au /export/sealed/$sealed /mnt/10.3.14.17/export/sealed/
rsync -au /export/cache/$cache /mnt/10.3.14.17/export/cache/
} &
while [ pgrep -c rsync -gt 5 ]
do
sleep 10
done
done

entry.content:
title:信息

#ip
hostname -I
#cpu
lscpu
#GPU
nvidia-smi -L
#内存条
dmidecode|grep -P -A13 “Memory\s+Device”|grep -E “Size|Manufacturer:”|grep -v Range
dmidecode -t 17 | grep “Size.*MB” | wc -l
#主板信息
dmidecode |grep -A16 “System Information$”
#nvme盘
lsscsi
第一列：SCSI设备id：host, channel,id,lun。
第二列：设备类型。
第3，4，5列：设备厂商，型号，版本信息。
最后一列：设备主节点名。lsscsi -s显示容量大小。-c 用全称显示默认的信息。-d 显示设备主，次设备号。-g 显示对应的sg设备名。-H 显示主机控制器列表，-Hl,-Hlv。-l 显示相关属性，-ll,-lll=-L。-v 显示设备属性所在目录。-x 以16进制显示lun号。-p 输出DIF,DIX 保护类型。-P 输出有效的保护模式信息。-i 显示udev相关的属性-w 显示WWN
-t显示相应传输信息(ATA,FC,SBP,ISCSI,SPI,SAS,SATA,USB)，-Ht,-tl.（包括sas地址）
nvme list
#网口
ethtool enp1s0f0

pkill dpkg
dpkg –configure -a
apt install lsscsi
ip route del default via 10.0.255.254
ip route add default via 10.0.10.9
apt install lsscsi

entry.content:
title:miner部署

1、系统优化
cat >/etc/security/limits.d/20-nproc.conf<<EOF

  •      soft    nproc     102400
    root soft nproc unlimited
    EOF
    cat >/etc/security/limits.conf<<EOF
  •           soft    nofile          10000000
  •           hard    nofile          10000000
    root soft nofile 10000000
    root hard nofile 10000000
  •           soft    noproc          65000
  •           hard    noproc          65000
    EOF

cat >/etc/sysctl.conf<<EOF
fs.file-max=10000000
fs.nr_open=10000000
net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse = 1
net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout = 30
net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time = 1200
net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range = 10000 65000
net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog = 204800
net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets = 204800
net.ipv4.tcp_max_orphans = 204800
net.core.netdev_max_backlog = 204800
net.core.somaxconn = 131070
vm.swappiness = 0
net.unix.max_dgram_qlen = 128
net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter = 0
net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter = 0
net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route = 0
net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route = 0
net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh1 = 512
net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh2 = 28672
net.ipv4.neigh.default.gc_thresh3 = 32768
vm.dirty_background_ratio = 15
vm.dirty_ratio = 20
vm.dirty_expire_centisecs = 6000
EOF
sysctl -p

sed -i “/DefaultLimitNOFILE/c DefaultLimitNOFILE=10000000” /etc/systemd/system.conf
sed -i “/DefaultLimitNPROC/c DefaultLimitNPROC=10000000” /etc/systemd/system.conf
systemctl daemon-reexec

2、依赖安装
apt update

apt install -y tcpdump bash-completion bc net-tools mtr traceroute psmisc tcptrack nload ntpdate lsof tree lrzsz wget glances rsync zip unzip tcptraceroute hwloc ipmitool nvidia-driver-470 tmux -y

3、时间同步及CST时区设置
timedatectl set-timezone Asia/Shanghai
(crontab -l;echo “*/1 * * * * /usr/sbin/ntpdate cn.pool.ntp.org &>/dev/null”) |crontab

4、nvme盘组RAID1
parted /dev/nvme0n1 mklabel loop

mdadm -Cv /dev/md0 -a yes -n 磁盘数量 -l RAID级别 数据盘1 数据盘2 ….

mdadm -Cv /dev/md0 -a yes -n 2 -l 1 /dev/nvme1n1 /dev/nvme2n1
mdadm -D –scan >/etc/mdadm.conf
mkfs.xfs /dev/md0
ls -l /dev/disk/by-uuid/|awk ‘/md0/{print “echo "/dev/disk/by-uuid/“$9” /opt/raid0 xfs defaults 0 0" >>/etc/fstab”}’|bash
mount -a

确认挂载正确

df -h /opt/raid0

5、 lotus 服务部署

创建工作目录

workpath=/opt/raid0
mkdir -p /${workpath}/{lotus/bin,filecoin-proof-parameters}
#下载程序(可以拷贝)
拷贝lotus
做软连接
so ${workpath}/lotus/bin/lotus /usr/local/bin/lotus

6、下载快照 chain.car
cd /opt/raid0/
在有lotus上执行
导出快照
lotus chain export –skip-old-msgs –recent-stateroots=900 chain.car
方法2:
curl -sI https://fil-chain-snapshots-fallback.s3.amazonaws.com/mainnet/minimal_finality_stateroots_latest.car | perl -ne ‘/x-amz-website-redirect-location:\s(.+).car/ && print “$1.sha256sum\n$1.car”‘ | xargs wget
https://lotus.filecoin.io/lotus/manage/chain-management/

7、下载证明参数 filecoin-proof-parameters
在有的地方拷贝

8、创建环境变量文件

lotus 相关环境变量

mkdir -p /opt/raid0/minerbackup
rayonnum=lscpu |awk '/^CPU\(s\):/{print $2*2}'
gpuid0=lspci|awk '/VGA.*NVIDIA Corporation/{print strtonum("0x"$1)}'|sed -n 1p
gpuid1=lspci|awk '/VGA.*NVIDIA Corporation/{print strtonum("0x"$1)}'|sed -n 2p
[ -z “$gpuid1” ] && gpuid1=$gpuid0

cat >/opt/raid0/profile<<EOF

common

export PATH=${PATH}:/usr/local/bin/
export RUST_LOG=info
export FIL_PROOFS_PARENT_CACHE=/opt/raid0/filecoin-parents/
export FIL_PROOFS_PARAMETER_CACHE=/opt/raid0/filecoin-proof-parameters/
export IPFS_GATEWAY=”https://proof-parameters.s3.cn-south-1.jdcloud-oss.com/ipfs/"

lotus

export LOTUS_PATH=/opt/raid0/lotus
export TMPDIR=/opt/raid0/

#export LOTUS_BACKUP_BASE_PATH=/opt/raid0/minerbackup （分离的时候需要使用）
EOF

配置自动导入环境变量

echo “source /opt/raid0/profile” >>/etc/profile

9、创建进程配置文件

lotus 进程配置

ip=hostname -I|awk '{print $1}'（注意ip的正确）

cat >/opt/raid0/lotus/config.toml<<EOF
[API]
ListenAddress = “/ip4/${ip}/tcp/1234/http”
[Backup]
DisableMetadataLog = true
[Libp2p]
[Pubsub]
[Client]
[Metrics]
[Wallet]
[Fees]
[Chainstore]
EOF

10、 创建启动脚本
cat >/opt/raid0/start_lotus.sh<<EOF
#!/bin/bash
source /opt/raid0/profile
nohup lotus daemon > /opt/raid0/lotus/logs 2>&1 &
EOF

11、导入快照

导入环境变量

source /opt/raid0/profile

以前台运行方式导入快照, 建议用复用终端tmux进行

ll
/opt/raid0/minimal_finality_stateroots_517061_2021-02-20_11-00-00.car

导入快照

lotus daemon –import-snapshot chain.car

#启动lotus
bash /opt/raid0/start_lotus.sh

检查同步高度, 输出Done表示同步完成

lotus sync wait

#导入结束后直接结束进程pkill lotus，通过脚本方式后台启动。

12、启动服务

脚本方式启动

bash /opt/raid0/start_lotus.sh

检查运行日志

tail -f /opt/raid0/lotus/logs

13、创建worker及owner钱包

创建两个钱包地址，lotus自身不区分钱包用途，这里的worker和owner概念来自miner。

lotus wallet new bls
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx1

lotus wallet new bls
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx2

查看钱包地址

lotus wallet list
Address Balance Nonce
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx1 0 FIL 0
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx2 0 FIL 0

14、为owner钱包充值1个fil
选择其中一个地址作为owner钱包，创建矿工号时需要手续费

15、再建一个地址做control钱包
lotus-miner actor control set –really-do-it 钱包地址

16 lotus-miner 服务部署
17、创建工作目录及下载程序
workpath=/opt/raid0
mkdir -p /${workpath}/{lotusminer/bin,filecoin-proof-parameters,minerbackup}

18、拷贝lotus-miner
在有的地方去拷贝

19、做软链接
ln -fs /opt/raid0/lotusminer/bin/lotus-miner /usr/local/bin/lotus-miner

20、创建环境变量文件
cat >/opt/raid0/profile<<EOF

common

export PATH=${PATH}:/usr/local/bin/
export RUST_LOG=info
export FIL_PROOFS_PARENT_CACHE=/opt/raid0/filecoin-parents/
export FIL_PROOFS_PARAMETER_CACHE=/opt/raid0/filecoin-proof-parameters/
export IPFS_GATEWAY=”https://proof-parameters.s3.cn-south-1.jdcloud-oss.com/ipfs/"

lotus

export LOTUS_PATH=/opt/raid0/lotus
export TMPDIR=/opt/raid0/

lotus-miner

export SCH_QUERY_WORKER=true
export FIL_PROOFS_FIN_TICKETS=0
export FIL_PROOFS_FIN_TICKET_INTERVAL=0
export FIL_PROOFS_P1_TICKETS=2
export FIL_PROOFS_P1_TICKET_INTERVAL=4
export GOLOG_LOG_LEVEL=info
export no_fetch_params=true
export FIL_PROOFS_PARAMETER_CACHE=/opt/raid0/filecoin-proof-parameters/
export LOTUS_MINER_PATH=/opt/raid0/lotusminer
export LOTUS_BACKUP_BASE_PATH=/opt/raid0/minerbackup
#export BELLMAN_CPU_SET=
export BELLMAN_GPU_BUS_ID=${gpuid0}
export RAYON_NUM_THREADS=${rayonnum}
export FIL_PROOFS_WINNING_POST_GPU=${gpuid0}
export FIL_PROOFS_WINDOW_POST_GPU=${gpuid1}
EOF

配置自动导入环境变量

echo “source /opt/raid0/profile” >>/etc/profile

21、创建进程配置文件
ip=hostname -I|awk '{print $1}'

cp /opt/raid0/lotusminer/config.toml{,.bak}
cat >/opt/raid0/lotusminer/config.toml<<EOF
[API]
ListenAddress = “/ip4/${ip}/tcp/2345/http”
[Backup]
DisableMetadataLog = true
[Libp2p]
[Pubsub]
[Dealmaking]
[Sealing]
MaxWaitDealsSectors = 2
MaxSealingSectors = 0
MaxSealingSectorsForDeals = 0
AlwaysKeepUnsealedCopy = true
FinalizeEarly = true
BatchPreCommits = false
AggregateCommits = false
[Storage]
[Fees]
MaxPreCommitGasFee = “0.025 FIL”
MaxCommitGasFee = “0.05 FIL”
MaxTerminateGasFee = “0.5 FIL”
MaxWindowPoStGasFee = “5 FIL”
MaxPublishDealsFee = “0.05 FIL”
MaxMarketBalanceAddFee = “0.007 FIL”
[Fees.MaxPreCommitBatchGasFee]
Base = “0 FIL”
PerSector = “0.02 FIL”
[Fees.MaxCommitBatchGasFee]
Base = “0 FIL”
PerSector = “0.03 FIL”
[Addresses]
EOF

22、创建启动脚本
cat >/opt/raid0/start_lotusminer.sh<<EOF
#!/bin/bash
source /opt/raid0/profile
logbak=${LOTUS_MINER_PATH}/logbak
time=`date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S`
[ -f ${LOTUS_MINER_PATH}/logs ] && mkdir -p $logbak && mv ${LOTUS_MINER_PATH}/logs $logbak/miner_${time}.log
nohup lotus-miner run > /opt/raid0/lotusminer/logs 2>&1 &
EOF

23、创建矿工号
lotus-miner init –no-local-storage –sector-size 64GiB –owner=$owner –worker=$worker

24、启动服务
脚本启动
bash /opt/raid0/start_lotusminer.sh
查看日志
tail -f /opt/raid0/lotusminer/logs
查看 miner 状态
lotus-miner info

DC封装

版本低于1.17.0需要部署boost v1.2.0的，默认是v1.4.0

部署boost接单程序，在miner机器上部署

vim ~/.boost/config.toml

10,修改调度miner的配置文件

vim /opt/raid0/lotusminer-sealing/lotusminer/config.toml

vim /opt/raid0/lotusminer-sealing/profile

修改完后重启调度miner和boost

11,调度miner发布p2p地址

lotus-miner actor set-addrs “/ip4/39.109.85.24/tcp/12288”

12，随便找个miner询价测试
13,转币到market
14，boostd导入订单

部署boost发单程序

2，部署rsut程序

6，初始化boost
7，boost发单

singularity（奇点）

切car工具
